name: appointments_read
description: Retrieve an existing appointment or break

$ul: **base_recurring_appointment**: ID of base appointment of a recurrign series
**billing_notes**: Billing notes of the appointment. For writing, check `/api/claim_billing_notes`

**billing_status**: Should be one of `Auto Accident Claim`, `Balance Due`, `Bill Insurance`, `Bill Secondary Insurance`, `Durable Medical Equipment Claim`, `Internal Review`, `Paid In Full`, `Settled`, `Worker's Comp Claim` or one of the custom billing status
**cloned_from**: ID of the original appointment which this appointment cloned from. Will be null if the appointment is not cloned.
**custom_vitals**: Custom vitals associated with this appointment.
**duration**: Length of the appointment in minutes. Optional if `profile` is provided.
**exam_room**: Index of the exam room that this appointment occurs in. See `/api/offices`
**extended_updated_at**: The most recent update time among appointment itself, its vitals and its custom vitals
**id**: Unique identifier. Usually numeric, but not always
**is_walk_in**: Whether the appointment is a walk-in appointment
**patient**: ID of this appointment's patient. Breaks have a null patient field.

**profile**: ID of an `/api/appointment_profiles` instance. The profile sets default values for `color`, `duration`, and `reason` on creation, which can be overriden by setting these values explicitly.
**recurring_appointment**: Whether the appointment is a recurring appointment or not
**reminder_profile**: Write-only. ID of an `/api/reminder_profiles` instance. Set this to apply a reminder profile to the appointment. Cannot be applied to an appointment with reminders.
**scheduled_time**: The starting time of the appointment
**status**: One of ``, `Arrived`, `Checked In`, `In Room`, `Cancelled`, `Complete`, `Confirmed`, `In Session`, `No Show`, `Not Confirmed`, or `Rescheduled`. Or one of the custom statuses.
**supervising_provider**: Supervising provider of appointment if set.
**vitals**: Clinical vitals associated with the appointment
